website_summaries.verdict: Simple, elegant, and versatile. These shoes coordinate well with everything but athletic wear, which is good, because they have almost zero support.
pros: Maxi dresses, shorts, and jeans, these sandals go with everything
Thong-style construction with a variety of upper materials, depending on color
cons: Not a great shoe for days with lots of walking

customer_reviews.title: I loved these so much, I bought them twice!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this exact sandal. My first pair lasted more than 5 years, so I think these sandals are a total bargain. Before this style became so common, I frequently got compliments on them. They really go with everything, and work with casual as well as dressier clothing. The boa pattern adds a little extra something that I love...otherwise, they look kind of cheap, like tin foil or something. The only negative about these shoes is there is zero arch support, so if you have high arches, these may not be for you. Otherwise, they're fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shoes! I love them, cute, fit very well, true to size and the greatest thing is that you can truly wear these sandals all day long. I only wear sandals, and I can tell you some are really cute, but after 6 hours your feet hurt, I can guarantee you that you can wear Sam Edelman's Gigi's for 18 hours with no problems, cause I have done it many times. I have them in 18 colors and will get some more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: so versatile!  they go with everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Caribbean cruise, and they are exactly what I wanted. The gold color is shiny enough to wear with fancier outfits, but also still works perfectly with jeans or capris. They literally went with every evening outfit I packed. Next time I won't bother bringing heels at all! They are a bit narrow, so if you have wide feet, they might not work for you. For me, then run about a 1/2 size small. I generally wear a size 8, and the 8 1/2 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size! These run small and wide sizes run narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed at how small these shoes run. I wear size 9W in Sam Edelman heels and boots all the time, but apparently not in these shoes. Size up! Also, the quality seems decent, but I think these are a tad overpriced for what you get. Returned mine and went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nutsch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! The ankle strap of the left sandal ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. I usually wear a 9.5 and it was true to size. Perfect fit! The ankle strap of the left sandal was a little shorter than the right sandal (odd..) so it was a little too tight at first but I managed to stretch it out just enough. If they weren't so expensive I'd be buying a second pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this Sexy 👡
customer_reviews.text: I had know idea these sandals were this pretty and comfortable. Great quality, color, size perfect and it has a chusion. I'm going to update my review after I'm able to the nail salon lol. Blame COVID-19.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely! But runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! I truly adore the colors! The only thing is that it runs a little small! I'm size 9 or 9.5, on this occasion I bought size 9.5 and I feel it kind of small; it could it be nice to find it in size 10, but they were not available at the moment. Stills the sandals are legit!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandal for narrow feet, order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these sandals! This is my fourth pair of Sam Edelman sandals and will not be my last. My feet are very narrow and Sam Edelman caters to the narrow foot crowd! Comfy foot bed for a sandal, good quality that will last for several summers (and that's if you wear them almost every day.) Love the gold as I wear gold jewelry and gold goes with everything. I usually wear a size 6.5 in Sam Edelman sandals, but the 6.5 was a tad too small, so I exchanged for a medium. Make sure to order a half size up!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals. They are cute and comfortable. BUT, I bought a gold pair, the strap promptly ripped out between the toes. I thought it was a fluke so i bought two more pairs-- gold and silver. The new ones immediately ripped too. The materials aren't cheap (and neither are the sandals,-$80/pair) they seem high quality but they are poorly made. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Nicest Thong Sandal Ever
customer_reviews.text: Quality all the way! Padded bottom makes them very comfortable for a long day of wear. Colors are bright and beautiful. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Marware

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty flimsy and narrow sandal for a wife foot. Footbed also not as comfy as it looks. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: MayaJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: Actually I have a wide foot and this type of Sandler is notoriously too narrow. This Sandler fits better than most and is very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Pinno

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrower than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and quality of the shoe, which is why I ordered it. I have a medium width foot, size 6-1/2. These sandals were just too narrow. I returned them and did not order the next size up because I was afraid they would be too long, and still too narrow. Wish they would have been a bit wider.....I really loved them.
customer_reviews.author: DCCrook

customer_reviews.title: Best sandal purchase I've made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Turquoise Time in the Sam Edelman Gigi sandal. I wear a size 8 with average foot width and these fit as expected. They are absolutely stunning. There is a card included with the sandals that advises wearing on a sunny day as their unique dye process may cause color transfer when wet. The style of the sandal is timeless, but the colors on Turquoise Time make this sandal a true standout.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Stood the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these three years ago and wear them often in the summer. Elegant enough to wear to work with a nice skirt and casual enough for anywhere on the weekend. They are still holding together we'll. The fit is good and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather and style. I love the designer always top quality
customer_reviews.author: Concha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These run small. Very Cute sandal. Order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Roni♥️

customer_reviews.title: Sam Elderman - Gigi
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and attractive. Ciuld have been half suze longer. Soft silver was very "loud and shiny". Not what i expected. Otherwise satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Island Gyal

customer_reviews.title: Great classic sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! Well made, high quality. They go with everything. I’ve worn them all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love them😁
customer_reviews.text: Just received these shoes. They arrived in three days and on a Sunday. I didn't listen to the reviews and ordered my exact size 8.5.They run a little short and narrow but not enough for me me to return them.My toes are not hanging over.I compared them to my other thong sandals and it's not that much of a difference.I think size 9 would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: MGreenawayUnknown

customer_reviews.title: If you have to wear flats ...
customer_reviews.text: After 20 years of heels and bad luck in the foot genetics lottery, I developed a small bunion on my right foot. In order to avoid it growing into an unsightly deformity and to avoid surgery, I have been investing in cute flats. These fit the bill perfectly. I purchased the gold ones, one size larger than my usual 8. They look polished enough for work and sexy enough for date nights, but are quite comfortable and bunion friendly. Went back and ordered the black leather and whiskey versions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Koukla

customer_reviews.title: strap runs short
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, my size was correct, however the strap was too short for my ankle. I don't have big legs and find that a common theme with SE thong sandals. I will keep trying because they are made well and have a large variety of colors and styles
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Alhadeff

customer_reviews.title: perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this same sandal 3 years in a row. My daughter and I share them- and love them. They last about a year- with pretty regular wear by one of us. Eventually they stretch and need to be replaced. Have bought similar versions by other designers- but these last longer and just are a better shoe than the cheaper versions. Fit true to size. Also- her foot is more narrow than mine- but they work well for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fifield

customer_reviews.title: Long toes.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 10 but after reading the reviews that reccomended purchasing a size larger, I diligently placed my order for the 10.5. However, while they fit perfectly around my ankle on the last hole, they were too short in the front for my toes. I tried on the 11s at Nordstrom's and the same problem persisted. Also, they were too big around my heel anyway. My toes aren't freakishly long but I do have long, narrowish feet. It's such a shame because the gold ones that I bought looked perfect and were comfortable but my toes were just a bit too close to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Doktor Glass

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and priced right
customer_reviews.text: My life was very happy with these. She couldn't find her size locally, and this turned out to be better because it saved her time looking around the local stores, and it turned out to be less expensive on Amazon anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Dogula

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Wear these every day and are super cute. Go with everything and surprisingly sturdy. Shipped quickly also
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Too Exact!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and have not worn yet. Love the look, seems comfortable and good workmanship but they are too true to size. If you are in doubt about the size, I would get a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ani03

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple pairs of this style Sam Edelman and they are all 8. This is the first pair I bought online. They are a bit small. Willing to give the 8.5 a chance. Will write a review for those when they arrive
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bankston

customer_reviews.title: Great value and beautiful sandal
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandal because it fits my narrow foot beautifully!! Just needed to order up a 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Florida MFT

customer_reviews.title: super comfy have worn them throughout the entire day with ...
customer_reviews.text: Get compliments on these sandals constantly - loooove the silver pair and want to buy more colors, super comfy have worn them throughout the entire day with no issues! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I wore these to a wedding. They looked and felt great.
customer_reviews.author: Katkaty54

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were adorable and comfortable, however after less than two months of use, they are falling apart. The gold is peeling off and the strap already broke once. I was able to re-sew it, but for the price of these sandals, I'm completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M.

customer_reviews.title: Run small!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but I would recommend going up half a size. I am a true 8.5 even in this brand, but for some reason, these are a tad short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these is leopard print! I already have a purple pair from last year. They were timely arrival and they are very cute! The sole is alittle padded so very comfortable. They run very true to size. I wear 6-6.5 and these fit in a 6.5! I know I will wear these all the time this summer! they are just over all a very good investment!! Couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle A. Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: stylish sandals
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the previous reviews I ordered up a half size, and the fit was perfect. I've already purchased a second pair, Amazon's prices are amazing! I can't vouch for comfort after long wear time yet, but the foot bed is nicely padded and the thong part between your toes doesn't feel uncomfortable. With so many colors to choose from, this will be a staple in my summer wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect color and very sturdy. They are dressy enough for work but casual enough for weekends. The perfect summer sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great on in the summer with a nice pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: mhgreersc

customer_reviews.title: My feet are not wide at all, but, ...
customer_reviews.text: My feet are not wide at all, but, the shoe is narrow. I had to size up to keep my foot from touching the ground on the sides near at the widest part of the foot from the to the pinky toe
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals!! That's what I keep hearing from people. Love it! Noticed the price has increased. So glad I bought it when it was only at $32. Very good quality and I'm pretty sure this will last very long!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were fine but I paid $55
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were fine but I paid $55.73 and bought them as a gift. I only checked one shoe to make sure they were correct and the other one had a price tag on it from Marshall’s for $19.90!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lukasik

customer_reviews.title: Love but weird fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister and she loves them! The only complaint is that they seem to run a little small but then the leather straps stretch out a little bit so you need the smaller size. I would recommend 1/2 size smaller but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!! Well made!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute in the Almond color! Love they offer a size 4 1/2 with my super small feet!! Great sandals!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Clement

customer_reviews.title: I previously had the sandals and brought these as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the sandals and brought these as a replacement. I wore the previous sandals in the rain and they stretch out of shape. Warning do not wear the sandals in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Cree

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandal, wrong color choice
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item, I did not expect the silver to be so shiny like foil! Otherwise great fit and they look nice. I will try another color in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shiny great quality. A lil pricy. But worth it
customer_reviews.author: Pfeifa

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sandals. A little on the narrow size, but I don't care. Wear casual or dressy so they are very versatile and worth the money. I have the Leopard and silver, hoping they come out with a red!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I was able to find the best price on Amazon and could not be any
customer_reviews.text: This item is just as described. I was able to find the best price on Amazon and could not be any happier
customer_reviews.author: JSmooth

customer_reviews.title: Classic sandals
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these. They are comfie. I especially love the,sleek silver color.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Silver is NOT leather!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sandals and luckily ordered a half size up. I was disappointed that the silver is NOT leather. I also ordered a brown pair and that one is leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Looking and Uncomfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were shipped promptly. Too bad they were not attractive (gold was cheap looking) and uncomfortable. Absolutely no support and soles that feel like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Wear
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and I like the vesatility of this shoe. It can be dressed up, or down.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Used sandal
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not new, the base looks that it waa used not just once but many times. A picture would be the best way to describe the issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forgot I was even wearing them.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I bought them to go with jeans and they are a perfect match. They are not really navy blue as listed, but a softer medium blue color - more like slightly faded denim. They were so comfortable I almost forgot I had them on.
customer_reviews.author: Suki's Mom

customer_reviews.title: The shoe cam grossly overworn
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the information did it say this shoe had been previously worn. It was disgusting and I sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: WHile there is no arch support, it should be noted that these are FLATS and as such should not have arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro Mehale

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sandals. I usually wear a seven, however I should have read others reviews and ordered up a half size. They were out of the 7 1/2 so I was out of luck. I do think these shoes would have been comfortable, though. Still giving them a four star.
customer_reviews.author: XH

customer_reviews.title: ... sandals for a while now and this one fits great! Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: I've needed a everyday pair of silver sandals for a while now and this one fits great! Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JamrockGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I have bought. Goes with everything, true to size, and comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Staycee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I wear them everywhere, I even have a Sam Edelmen Gigi tan line on my feet! So cute and great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Dress up or down
customer_reviews.text: I wear this with my maxi dresses, Capris, jeans...any and everything. I can dress them up or down. The gold is really nice as it's a real gold metallic color which matches my real gold jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Epl711

customer_reviews.title: Like all my Sam Edelman sandals these are very comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Like all my Sam Edelman sandals these are very comfortable and true to size, if anything I might take a 1/2 size up. I really like the Silver Boa!
customer_reviews.author: june g.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty summer sandal!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my teenaged daughter when we went down south. She found them great to wear with skirts, dresses and shorts. They were perfect for wearing around our resort...I only gave them a 4 star rating because they weren't the most comfortable footwear. My daughter could wear them for a couple of hours, easily, but after that, she'd take them off. Overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals in a classic style. And they go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferdesmarais

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these sandals! I have 2 pairs. I would not recommend wearing these when you are going to be walking a lot, just like with most flat sandals. They are cute, you can dress them up or down. I usually wear a 9 in sandals, but after reading reviews I had ordered a 9 1/2 for my first pair and that was a mistake. It left to much extra space above the toes causing me to trip! And my foot would slide around everywhere. Unless you like your sandals a tad bit bigger with room in the front, order your regular size!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The thong part is very rough and cuts into the space in between my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Control Unit

customer_reviews.title: and I would be more comfortable in an 8
customer_reviews.text: Cute sandals, however they run on the small and narrow side. I normally wear a 7.5/8, and I would be more comfortable in an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Galeana

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and the gold color is beautiful! i love them, these will definitely be my staple summer sandals from now on! I am usually a 7.5 or 8, just depends on the brand. I ordered these in an 8, and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: greenlover

customer_reviews.title: Really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The piece between the toes was too wide and very uncomfortable. I returned these immediately. There wasn't much padding in the soles either. I've tried on other Sam Edelman sandals and flats before that were much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations and there was a sticker on the leopard print confirming that the sandal is made of real leather and not some other poor animal..
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are perfect, they are exactly as I expected and enjoy wearing them as much as possible. Will be ordering more in different colors for sure!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: New fave sandals
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. Comfortable. Durable. Just well made altogether. I will be a return buyer! I can see Sam Edelman becoming a staple in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: I'm normally a 6. 5 so that's what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 6.5 so that's what I ordered, but they are too short. Returning them for 7.
customer_reviews.author: BPA

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I luv these sandals. Goes well with my dress and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good Lookin
customer_reviews.text: Just got this sandal and it is so pretty and comfy! I got the coral and it is a really pretty red...love, just as pictured. Glad I listened to everyone else and went up a size in a half. I got an 8.5. Also, these are very narrow (luckily I have skinny feet, and mine just fit) so if you do have wide feet these may not work. For the price, and cuteness factor definitely these are a do!
customer_reviews.author: Bnewgil

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed BECAUSE. the leopard print is not the same ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my leopard print gigi thong sandals today. I was disappointed BECAUSE. the leopard print is not the same on the right and left sandal. the left sandal has 7 spots and the right one has 4 spots and it just looks odd I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want every color!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sam Edelman shoes. These are so comfortable and easy to wear. I also got them in the black patent leather color.
customer_reviews.author: CA_Jess2cute

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, cute shoes. I vary between 8-8.5 and went with the 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: ERT NYC

customer_reviews.title: Got disapointed, I thought the sandal would be made ...
customer_reviews.text: Got disapointed, I thought the sandal would be made in leather, but the upper of the sandal seems a plastic and stif material!!! Cheap made in china!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, they look great, and are super comfy. Can't beat the price on amazon, less expensive than the department stores.
customer_reviews.author: kslmbuggie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love!!!! The best casual shoe ever, Love Sam Edelman's!
customer_reviews.author: Tawayanna

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fast delivery. Shoes are adorable. Fit is great. I have these shoes in 3 different colors. Comfortable to wear all day, even to the zoo walking around. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SamiJane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: well i order this again and it was wore and didnt come in right box i was very upset
customer_reviews.author: kathyallen

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes but wow amazon box was almost ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but wow amazon box was almost ripped in half! Glad my shoes weren't messed but very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes - this is a repeat buy for me. Comfortable to wear all day unless you're doing the type of walking better suited for sneakers. No arch support, but it's not a major problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: davis hester

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes... so simple and comfortable wear with anything!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: ... pairs of these sandals in different colours - they're great for summer and work well with dresses
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these sandals in different colours - they're great for summer and work well with dresses, shorts and jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As stated in other reviews, These shoes run a ...
customer_reviews.text: As stated in other reviews, These shoes run a little small. I typically wear a 10 and I got a 10.5 and they fit perfectly. I wore them all day today and walked around a lot and my feet don't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A summer staple
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so cute and versatile! I wasn't sure I wanted to spend this much for a simple sandal, but now I'm glad a did. They're pretty comfortable (just a little rubbing the first time I wore them to do a lot of walking) but hopefully that's just a matter of breaking them in. They do seem to run small. I usually wear a 7.5 and ordered an 8, but they're still on the small side. If they were any smaller I would have been forced to return them. Just keep that in mind and you should be all set!
customer_reviews.author: Gmd431

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are super cute, comfortable and true to size. They will be perfect for Gator game days this fall!
customer_reviews.author: memerson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful silver sandal. Fit as expected for the size selected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, well-made and fit well. I purchased the cobalt and the colours are beautiful. So tempted to buy it in other colours!
customer_reviews.author: LHF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all round
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals and amazing quick round the world delivery from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, super comfy shoe! A must have and such a great price. Highly recommend these cute shoes!! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love that there's more padding than other summer sandals! I am going to be buying these in other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great look!
customer_reviews.text: they are good quality and look beautiful! I was looking for nice and simple sandals for a long time, I really like this ones!
customer_reviews.author: Estefi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sandals. They were everything I expected great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: I love these Sam Edelman sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes twice. Once for myself and the other pair for my mother. I love these Sam Edelman sandals. I would recommend going up 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lee-Doyle

customer_reviews.title: small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, but was a full size too small and narrow, even though I'd ordered a half size larger than my usual size due to previous reviews. Definitely not recommended for wide feet. Also, the cork was missing in obvious areas on the toe strap of one of the sandals. Perhaps there is a quality control issue with the cork style. Had to return them, but was grateful for Amazon's return policy.
customer_reviews.author: mopani

customer_reviews.title: Summer perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Unlike most flat shoes, can be worn for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: The color is very cheeky! and fun...good for any outfit...shorts, skirt, dress. would buy in white if it was leather not patent
customer_reviews.author: PL

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Gigi Flat Sandals
product_meta.description:
Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.Product Care - Leather Leather should be sprayed with stain repellant prior to wear and stored away from direct sunlight and heat sources to avoid drying out. If soiled, the item should be wiped with a clean, damp cloth and dried naturally. To shine, buff with a neutral or matching cream polish or leather lotion using a soft, dry cloth. Avoid liquid shoe polishes or polishes containing silicone. Patent Leather To avoid color transfer, patent leather items should be kept away from other patent leather and plastic materials. If soiled, patent leather cleaner should be used to clean the item - household clean products should never be used. Suede Suede should be sprayed with a stain repellant prior to wear and stored away from items that can cause color transfer. If soiled with dry dirt or a light smudge, a suede eraser or soft bristled brush should be used. Soiled areas should be brushed in the same direction as the suede grain. Polish or wire brushes should never be used. If soiled with a wet or oily stain, item should be taken to a professional cleaner. Beaded or Printed Materials Items should not be sprayed with replellant prior to wear as this can cause discoloration. Items should be stored away from items that can cause color transfer or those that can snag on beading.

Summer just got a little bit hotter and a whole lot easier. The textured thong upper consists of just a few well-placed straps over the foot and around the ankle. Add to that a flat sole and you'll be slipping into this at every oppportunity.
